Keywords: Excalibur , Horsemen , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Anna Marie LeBeau
Special Powers
EXCALIBUR, MYSTICAL PROTECTORS: [Mystics TA], but only triggers during range attacks. Rogue has PROTECTED: [Mystics TA].
WE STOPPED THE MONSTERS, WE SEALED THE...WHATEVER THAT WAS: When Rogue KO's an opposing bystander, after resolutions KO all opposing bystanders.
AH...I KILLED HIM: SIDELINE ACTIVE: When a friendly character named Rogue KO's a higher point opposing character, roll a d6. If the KO'd character was 100+ points, increase the result by +1. 6+: You may replace that Rogue with this character (On the same click #).

I don't get 'Ah....I killed him'. So you have to KO somebody and roll a 6 (or 5 if 'him' is enough points) and you get to swap out? Rolls don't add +1 for every kill? That seems like a whole lotta missing rolls to have her just hang out all game while your other Rogue gets KO'd.
